attributes.review: obviously after reading a parent’s review that stated a clown would come visit and entertain you after downloading the app, i was ecstatic! i needed a birthday clown for my 6 year old sons birthday party. my son has a rather......concerning obsession with clowns. after going to every mcdonalds in my county, asking every clown if they could entertain my son, and each one saying no, (especially the last one who filed a restraining order against me because my son chased me down and him for 7 blocks with a knife and loaded nerf gun) i was happy to finally find a free clown! as i read many reviews which all stated very good reviews, some with bad grammar, and some with cursed letters? i looked at a picture of the clown. it was a heavyweight, very creepy clown with blonde hair and orange hands. he looked mentally insane, but i thought, so is my son, so maybe they would get along well. the clown was smiling, with icecream in one hand and a machete in the other.... i quickly downloaded the app and sent a request for the clown. as soon as i opened the app they asked for a lot of personal information. i filled it out and waited. on my sons birthday, at exactly 1PM, the clown came to my door. everyone at the party went from happy, to surprised, to afraid. all of my sons friends and parents hid in a corner of the room. the clown insisted the doors stay locked, and added chains. he quickly pulled out 3 machetes and started to juggle them all at once. he dropped one, and it sliced a child’s head open. my son laughed out loud and grabbed a machete. he ran after all the other parents. i watched in horror, as the clown looked me in my eyes. he laughed so hard his mask fell off and he revealed to be, the donald trump. he told me “this is what you get, stupid democrat!” as he threw a pie in my face and tried to kill me. i barely escaped the claws of death, with banana cream pie in my eyes. i ran far. i have not seen my son since. do not download this app.
attributes.userName: wat is 2day why cant i slay
attributes.title: creepy clowns!
